Name: Ted Woolsey Uncensored Edition Script
Author: Mudstep
Description:
This is a port of the Ted Woolsey Uncensored Edition romhack, which is a script romhack for the SNES version of Final Fantasy VI made by Rodimus Primal and others in the community. The modified script is based on Woolsey's original translation of FFVI, but many lines are modified and/or retranslated to get a result more accurate to the source material, while still keeping the nuance and charm of Woolsey's script. For this mod, I replaced around 98% of the game's text with counterparts found in TWUE. The other 2% consists of some GBA/Pixel Remaster exclusive script additions, around 100 or so lines I couldn't find the counterparts to, the lyrics in the Opera Scene, and some tutorial text. If you plan on using this with [Shiryu64's Classic Textbox Framework Mod](https://www.nexusmods.com/finalfantasy6pixelremaster/mods/18), there's an alternate file to download.





Please let me know if you encounter any errors or issues with this mod!





Installation: extract the contents of the .zip file into the game's directory.





 **MEMORIA IS REQUIRED**


Download it here: https://github.com/Albeoris/Memoria.FFPR
